title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Percentage of population, with a total of 12 data points.
Overall Percentage of population has decreased over the Year.

Percentage of population is gradually decreasing from 2005 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2013, slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2014, slightly increasing from 2014 to 2016, and lastly roughly constant from 2016 to 2017.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2005 and 2006.
Max Percentage of population about 19.7 was recorded at Year 2005
Min Percentage of population about 6.9 was recorded at Year 2014
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Percentage of population, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2005 to 2014.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2014 to 2017.
